monster Vaction

{{ vacation.title }} in {{ vacation.destination }}

From {{ vacation.date_start.slice(0, vacation.date_start.length - 14) }} To {{ vacation.date_end.slice(0, vacation.date_end.length - 14) }}

{{ vacation.description }}

Just $ {{ vacation.price }}

Del

import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { HttpClient } from '@angular/common/http'; import { SharedService } from '../service/shared.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-vacations', templateUrl: './vacations.component.html', styleUrls: ['../vacations.component.css'], }) export class VacationsComponent implements OnInit { vacations: any; constructor(private http: HttpClient, sharedService: SharedService) {} ngOnInit() { this.http .get('https://react-node-mysql-jwt.herokuapp.com/vacations') .subscribe((data) => { this.vacations = data; }); } }
